alert.note: Alert for Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:22AM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MST TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches. Locally higher amounts of 4-8 inches above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Mountains, West Central Mountains, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Midnight MST Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
